text:
—In gratitude to the heroes who defeated the monster,
a village-wide banquet is held.
[Player] and the others were at the center, receiving much hospitality.

As the banquet began to settle down.
While [Player] was resting alone, a certain person called out to them.

name: Ganran
text:
—[Player].
With the festival ongoing, are you enjoying it?

options.text: Yes, I'm having a lot of fun!
I'm being given a lot of treats.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
If you're happy, then that's what matters most!

name: Ganran
text:
Despite all the dangers we faced,
I'm glad we can celebrate the village's safety like this!

name: Ganran
text:
But still, I'm tired...!
Tonight, I think I'll go into a hot sauna,
and relax a bit.

name: Ganran
text:
How about you?
Of course, I won't force you, but
would you like to go freshen up together later?
Ganran sat next to [Player] and struggled to match their eye level.

options.text: Of course, if it's with Ganran-san!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganran
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ohoho, you finally said something good!
Join me in this endurance contest!

options.text: I'm a little worried if I can keep up my stamina...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganran
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course, it doesn't have to be tonight,
you can always come anytime!
Join me in this endurance contest!

name: Ganran
text:
Well, when I'm with you all,
I just can't help but have fun and invite you, but
it's only fun if both of us are enjoying it, right!

name: Ganran
text:
Iron Rule, number one!
'Don't force anything on anyone who doesn't want it!'

options.text: Oh, an Iron Rule, it appeared!
The rules really suit a craftsman, don't they?

text: Smiling broadly, Ganran crossed his arms.

name: Ganran
text: Ah, rules are important in everything!

name: Ganran
text:
'If you're going to do it, do it with all your might'
'He who does not work, neither shall he eat'
'Always prioritize safety'—

name: Ganran
text:
'Live with hope at all times'
'Trust your companions and look forward'......

name: Ganran
text:
Everyone follows these rules, so
we can play happily and
stay safe, right?

name: Ganran
text:
That's why I call the rules that must absolutely be followed,
"Iron Rules"!
So that everyone can be happy!

name: Ganran
text: ...'Peace' and joy are what matter most!
Saying that, Ganran put the drink he was holding to his lips.

name: Ganran
text:
...I'm still inexperienced, but
my race is a bit longer-lived
than yours, [Player].

name: Ganran
text:
I'm only just barely a full-fledged adult, but
I've seen a lot, you know.

name: Ganran
text:
Rather than seeing a country, a village—
someone's livelihood disappear before my eyes,
I prefer to see everyone laughing peacefully.

name: Ganran
text:
That's why I create rules that are useful in such times.
At least so I don't get lost myself!

From the emotions glimpsed in Ganran's words,
[Player] remembered the story of Ganran's disciple.

options.text: I'm praying she comes back soon.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, thank you, [Player].
If you say that,
that sword-idiot will be happy.

name: Ganran
text:
...That's right, since you're here,
I might as well tell you.
...The continuation of my old story.
Taking another sip of his drink, Ganran murmured nostalgically.

name: Ganran
text:
...My connection with that kid's parents was a strange one.
It all started when they came to the workshop and asked me to forge an axe.

name: Ganran
text:
From then on, we gradually became friends.
Before I knew it, we were like family, doing everything together.

name: Ganran
text:
Barte was born, and
just when we were truly happy...
We suffered a monster attack.
Ganran placed his empty mug on the table and sighed softly.

name: Ganran
text:
...Barte's parents, from way back, dreamed of lasting "peace",
and worked hard for it.

name: Ganran
text:
I wanted to help them achieve that.
...That's why I'm happy that we were able to defeat the monster this time!

name: Ganran
text:
I'm sure Barte, and her parents...
They would want this future too!

options.text: We can't just leave the monster alone.

text: At [Player]'s words, Ganran nodded.

name: Ganran
text:
Barte is still a novice, but
she still has room to grow—
She's a good disciple.

name: Ganran
text:
Until she returns,
I, as her master, must keep the furnace lit and
continue to train myself.

name: Ganran
text:
And I have to train my body and endurance,
or Barte will make fun of me when she comes back!

name: Ganran
text:
I can't quit being a blacksmith until I forge the legendary axe,
and pass on that skill to my disciple!
Ganran let out a hearty laugh, then tightened his arms.

options.text: I really look up to you...!

text: At those words, Ganran put his arm around [Player]'s shoulder and grinned.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
What, are you interested too?

options.text: I'd like to become an apprentice too!

name: Ganran
text:
I've seen enough of your guts!
You're suited for blacksmithing too.

name: Ganran
text:
After that, you need a bit of strength too...
How are your muscles?
Come on, let me see!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha, not bad!
Want to feel the results of my training too?

name: Ganran
text:
It's okay to do it hard!
Rather, do it harder...!
Ganran spread his chest, inviting [Player] to touch.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha! Is that right?
...Oops, I got off topic!
Talking with you is so fun, I just get carried away!

name: Ganran
text:
But, when it comes to work,
I can't compromise!
Especially when forging steel!

name: Ganran
text:
If you're serious about becoming an apprentice,
then I'll have to seriously consider it,
Gahahaha!

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, that's right!
I have something to give you!
Ganran, in high spirits, laughed and rummaged through his bag.

name: Ganran
text: In Earth, you give chocolate filled with feelings to the other person, right?

name: Ganran
text:
As the guide for ChocoFull,
I wanted to try that myself!

name: Ganran
text:
The legendary chocolate, we'll make it together
with the hunters from now on—

name: Ganran
text:
This is my feeling!
Please accept it!
Ganran took out a small package from his bag and handed it to [Player].

options.text: Is it okay for me to have this?

name: Ganran
text:
I don't know if Garunderra-style chocolate
will suit your taste, but...

name: Ganran
text:
...It's the first time in my life!
Please try it!!
Come on, open it!
Ganran watched happily as [Player] opened the package.

—The banquet reached its finale,
and a large firework brightly bloomed,
beyond their joyful voices.
